name: The ring of Brave Deeds
data: It increases the users strength pathetically.
It increases the users dexterity pathetically.
It increases the users constitution pathetically.
It increases the users wisdom pathetically.
It increases the users intelligence pathetically.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
This ring will make its wearer ever so brave.
